definitions.definition: larger, more important, or having more influence than others of the same type:
examples: The main thing is not to worry.

definitions.definition: a large pipe that carries water or gas, or a wire carrying electricity, from one place to another, to which a house can be connected:
the system of pipes or wires that carry water or electricity into a house, or the pipes that carry sewage away from a house:
examples: The house isn't on the mains.

definitions.definition: the place at which outside pipes or wires carrying water, electricity, etc. connect with the system inside a house or building:
examples: Switch off the electricity at the mains before starting work.
